items.description: Program of research leading to the writing of an SM, PhD, or ScD thesis, to be arranged by the student and an appropriate MIT faculty member. Consult department headquarters.
items.label: Graduate Thesis

items.description: Research in engineering for the ocean environment, including naval architecture, wave energy, seakeeping, ocean exploration, ocean transportation, ocean vehicles, utilization of resources, marine economics, systems analysis, marine policy, marine hydrodynamics, ocean acoustics, ocean structures, sailing yachts, and some aspects of marine-related management. Hands-on experimental research in modern laboratory facilities.
items.label: Undergraduate Research
